<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emergency Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2104)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You become [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1), or an effect otherwise impedes your vision

**Requirement** You are an expert in Perception.
</row>

</column>

---

This eye, harvested from a monster, looks like it's peacefully sleeping but gives you a backup when you can't use your eyes. When the eye is activated, the eyelid pops open, and the eye stares frantically about. You see through the eye with normal vision until the end of your next turn, when the eye withers and flakes away.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Emergency Eye
requirement: You are an expert in Perception.
